target_markets.market_description: Business owners and building owners in tier 2 and tier 3 cities
pain_points: need for extra revenue from unused wall space
lack of creative out-of-home advertising options

target_markets.market_description: Content creators and artists looking for viral products

problems_validated.problem: Billboard mafia owns all premium advertising placements
problems_validated.market_gap: Blank walls (remnant inventory) are unused advertising opportunities

problems_validated.problem: Businesses struggle with organic customer acquisition and viral marketing
problems_validated.severity: High - affects growth and marketing costs
problems_validated.market_gap: Products that create viral loops through customer usage are rare

products_tools.name: Design Scientist
products_tools.use_case: All design work and copy for one monthly price

business_strategies.strategy: Viral loop integration - make customers share your story and bring more business organically
business_strategies.implementation: Create products that customers naturally want to create content around when they purchase
business_strategies.expected_results: Organic customer acquisition and viral growth
business_strategies.case_study: Content going viral on TikTok around creator inventions becoming sellable products

business_strategies.strategy: Narrative hijacking through art and attention manipulation
business_strategies.implementation: Start with a headline, reverse engineer how to achieve it, identify which publications to pitch
business_strategies.case_study: Hollywood sign changed to 'Hollyweed', millennial pink house painting project

problems_solutions.problem: Expensive billboard advertising with limited availability
problems_solutions.solution: Create mural agency using blank walls as remnant inventory

startup_ideas.target_market: Local businesses and building owners in smaller cities
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Expensive billboard advertising and unused wall space monetization
startup_ideas.business_model: Commission from wall owners, fees from advertisers for placement and artistic creation
startup_ideas.validation: Check for existing mural agencies in target city, identify blank walls, test with local building owners

startup_ideas.target_market: Content creators and social media users
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Need for shareable content and organic marketing
startup_ideas.business_model: Monthly subscription box of products that naturally create viral content when used
startup_ideas.validation: Monitor viral TikTok trends around creator inventions and new styles

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Difficulty scaling mural agency to new geographies
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Limited growth potential and market expansion
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus on tier 2/3 cities where competition is minimal
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Speaker's own experience with scaling challenges

growth_tactics.tactic: Create products that customers naturally want to create content around
steps: Develop products that enable content creation
Build viral loops into product usage
growth_tactics.results_expected: Organic customer acquisition and viral growth

growth_tactics.tactic: Reverse engineer headlines and create digital artifacts

metrics_kpis.metric: CPM (Cost Per Mille) for mural advertising
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on high-traffic locations and creative execution

comment_insights.insight: Content quality is appreciated but delivery energy could be improved for better engagement
